chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (x : op) (l : list op), get_op_input_keys (x :: l) = match x with | I k => k :: get_op_input_keys l | O _ => get_op_input_keys l end

Premises:
get_op_input_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I k => Some k | O _ => None end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_input_keys _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
acknowledge_all_ops_func_defn : forall (x : op) (l : list op) (target : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops_func (x :: l) target = match x with | I k => if acknowledged_op_dec k l then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else acknowledge_all_ops_func l target | O k => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target end
good_trace = fix good_trace (l : list IR) : Prop := match l with | [] => True | [IRI k] | IRI k :: IRI _ :: _ => False | IRI k :: IRO k' :: l' | IRI k :: IRU k' :: l' => k = k' /\ good_trace l' | _ => False end : list IR -> Prop Arguments good_trace _%list_scope
acknowledge_all_ops_func = fix acknowledge_all_ops_func (l : list op) (target : list IR) {struct l} : list IR := match l with | [] => [] | I k :: xs => if acknowledged_op_dec k xs then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target | O k :: xs => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target end : list op -> list IR -> list IR Arguments acknowledge_all_ops_func (_ _)%list_scope
BinIntDef.Z.compare = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => match y with | 0%Z => Eq | Z.pos _ => Lt | Z.neg _ => Gt end | Z.pos x' => match y with | Z.pos y' => (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Gt end | Z.neg x' => match y with | Z.neg y' => CompOpp (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Lt end end : Z -> Z -> comparison Arguments BinIntDef.Z.compare (_ _)%Z_scope
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
Inductive Permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := perm_nil : Permutation [] [] | perm_skip : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> Permutation (x :: l) (x :: l') | perm_swap : forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Permutation (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l) | perm_trans : forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> Permutation l l'' Arguments Permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments perm_nil _%type_scope Arguments perm_skip [A]%type_scope _ [l l']%list_scope Arguments perm_swap [A]%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments perm_trans [A]%type_scope [l l' l'']%list_scope
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.opp _%Z_scope
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
count_occ_cons_eq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x = y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = S (count_occ eq_dec l y)
count_occ_cons_neq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = count_occ eq_dec l y
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
BinIntDef.Z.of_nat = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => 0%Z | S n0 => Z.pos (Pos.of_succ_nat n0) end : nat -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.of_nat _%nat_scope
in_fold_left_by_cons_in : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list B) (g : B -> A) (x : A) (acc : list A), In x (fold_left (fun (a : list A) (b : B) => g b :: a) l acc) -> In x acc \/ (exists y : B, In y l /\ x = g y)
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
Inductive InA (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A) : list A -> Prop := InA_cons_hd : forall (y : A) (l : list A), eqA x y -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l) | InA_cons_tl : forall (y : A) (l : list A), SetoidList.InA eqA x l -> SetoidList.InA eqA x (y :: l) Arguments SetoidList.InA [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.InA_cons_hd [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x y] _%list_scope Arguments SetoidList.InA_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [eqA]%function_scope [x] _ [l]%list_scope
Inductive NoDup (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := NoDup_nil : NoDup [] | NoDup_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l) Arguments NoDup [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments NoDup_nil _%type_scope Arguments NoDup_cons [A]%type_scope _ [l]%list_scope
nodup_In : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), In x (nodup decA l) < -> In x l
dedup_not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> x :: dedup A_eq_dec xs = dedup A_eq_dec (x :: xs)
in_remove_all_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x l
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
count_occ_not_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x = 0
assoc_set_same : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l : list (K * V)) (k : K) (v : V), assoc K_eq_dec l k = Some v -> assoc_set K_eq_dec l k v = l

intros x l.
unfold get_op_input_keys.
rewrite filterMap_cons.
destruct x; simpl.
- rewrite filterMap_cons. reflexivity.
- rewrite filterMap_cons. reflexivity.
Qed.```
